item.description:
Hi all,

Something a little different to what we can do at home. I'm sure most of you have seen it but there is an outdoor skating rink in Boston common and I thought it would be fun to try it out. I don't know how to ice skate yet but I have done alot of slipping on ice over the last couple of weeks so I think I'll be ready for the next step. Speaking with people at the pub crawl I discovered that most of us haven't been iceskating so think there will be a few of us hanging onto the side wall and falling down.

Naturally, this being an Aussie event we will be heading to a nearby pub to warm up afterwards. I think we might try the 21st Amendment on Capital Hill, I haven't been there before so I'll confirm the afterpub a bit later. If you really don't want to do the iceskating, you could always meet us at the pub.

Let me know if this something you would like to do. If it is something you would like but the date isn't good let me know that too. I may need to look at booking depending on numbers. I also need to confirm the price but I think its about $20 to hire the sakes and skate.

Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Iceskating in Boston Common
